post.description: This API enables you to send messages via Plivou2019s SMS service.

parameters.name: dst
parameters.description: The number to which the message needs to be sent. Regular phone numbers must be prefixed with the country code but without the + sign. For e.g, a USA phone number would be, `15677654321`, with '1' denoting the country code. Multiple numbers can be added by using a delimiter.

parameters.name: log
parameters.description: If set to false, the content of this message will not be logged on the Plivo infrastructure and the dst value will be masked. (e.g., 141XXXXX528) Defaults to true.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The method used to call the url. Defaults to POST.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: The phone number to be used as the caller id (with the country code). For e.g. a USA number, `15671234567`. If you're sending messages to U.S. and Canada, you need to use the numbers you purchased with Plivo.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to send encoded in Unicode UTF-8. The API accepts up to 1000 bytes of UTF-8 encoded text in a single API request. The text will be automatically split into multiple parts and sent if it will not fit into a single SMS. See notes below for more details.

parameters.name: This API enables you to send messages via Plivou2019s SMS service.
parameters.description: AUTH TOKEN Your Plivo AUTH ID and AUTH TOKEN can be found when you login to your dashboard.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of message. Should be 'sms' for a text message. Defaults to 'sms'.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to which with the status of the message is sent.

get.description: Get details of a single message.

parameters.name: auth_id
parameters.description: AUTH TOKEN Your Plivo AUTH ID and AUTH TOKEN can be found when you login to your dashboard.

url.description: URL that pertain to the bid

status.description: Status of the lead (note this API only shows open leads)
